messageTemplates.name: registration_confirmation
messageTemplates.subject: Your Registration for {{ camp.name }} is Confirmed!
messageTemplates.body:
Dear {{ registration.campData.first_name }},

We are thrilled to confirm your registration for {{ camp.name }}! Get ready for an exciting and unforgettable camp experience.

Here are the details of your registration:

  • Camp Name: {{ camp.name }}
  • Camp Dates: {{ camp.dates }}
  • Location: {{ camp.location }}

We'll be sending more information as the camp date approaches. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at {{ camp.contact_email }}.

We can't wait to see you at camp!

Best regards,
{{ camp.organization_name }}

messageTemplates.name: waiting_list_notification
messageTemplates.subject: You're on the Waiting List for {{ camp.name }}
messageTemplates.body:
Dear {{ registration.campData.first_name }},

Thank you for your interest in {{ camp.name }}. Unfortunately, the camp is currently full, and your registration has been placed on our waiting list.

If a spot becomes available, we will notify you right away. In the meantime, if you have any questions, please reach out to us at {{ camp.contact_email }}.

We appreciate your patience and hope to see you at camp!

Best regards,
{{ camp.organization_name }}

messageTemplates.name: registration_notification
messageTemplates.subject: New Camper Registered for {{ camp.name }}
messageTemplates.body:
Dear Counselor,

We wanted to inform you that a new camper, {{ registration.campData.first_name }} {{ registration.campData.last_name }}, has been successfully registered for {{ camp.name }}.

Here are the details of the camper:

  • Name: {{ registration.campData.first_name }} {{ registration.campData.last_name }}
  • Age: {{ registration.campData.age }}
  • Parent/Guardian: {{ registration.campData.guardian_name }}

Please prepare to welcome this camper and ensure they have a fantastic experience at camp. For any further information, you can contact the camp administration at {{ camp.contact_email }}.

Thank you for your dedication and support!

Best regards,
{{ camp.organization_name }}
